channel.title: Server on hosted website ughhhh
channel.description:
Ok I'm having a real hard time here. I've looked for a good tut but all the ones I've found are for private servers and not how to put them on a hosted website.
I have done them several times on several different pc's as private servers. Now I'm trying to put one on a hosted website. I've done the tut for a Custom Client (YaY!!!!!!) but I can't get the .bat files to run on the hosted website therefore the server I'm trying to connect to with the custom client isn't running. Anyone know any tricks on getting the .bat files to run on a hosted website. I'm using Godaddy as my host and I own the domain name I have everything uploaded to.
Thanks in advacne
